<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>ignore</choice_action><coalesce>true</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="Vendor Master">e907672c87a6191093264085dabb359d</map><reference_value_field>sys_id</reference_value_field><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {


	var gr = new GlideRecord("sn_fin_legal_entity");
	gr.addQuery('erp_company_code', source.company_code);
	gr.query();
	if(gr.next()){
		return gr.getUniqueValue();
	}

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>x_snc_supl_mgmt_in_vendor_master_staging</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Prama</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-12 04:46:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>ef29e3ac87a6191093264085dabb3599</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Supplier Life Cycle Management Integration for SAP" source="x_snc_supl_mgmt_in">085c1636875291103844b8c4dabb3533</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Supplier Life Cycle Management Integration for SAP">085c1636875291103844b8c4dabb3533</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_ef29e3ac87a6191093264085dabb3599</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Prama</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-01 18:37:43</sys_updated_on><target_field>legal_entities</target_field><target_table>sn_fin_supplier</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
